name: Siesta (threelake)
description:
You are Jack. You need to nap before your night shift so you are not too tired to work. You must complete each level before your sleep runs out, and you wake up, causing your boss to be annoyed. 

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move

W, up arrow or space to jump

Collect pillow

Credits: Music and Sounds by Dom Is Offline, everything else is by me

This is my first fully complete game so it may not be perfect :)
